title: The Rich Man’s Life - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Mature   Mystery   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Early Romance   Fearless Protagonist   Friendship   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Personality Changes   Poor to Rich   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sudden Wealth   Wealthy Characters
author: A-Low-Key-Rich   低调有钱人
description:
Shook the riches and win hundreds of millions of prizes!

Let’s look at Ma Dong, a financial migrant worker, and how he turns the clouds over and rain money down the city!

TLN: According to the authors words, he wants to show you the life of rich people and their mind set, before and after they gain wealth, with a tweak of his own imagination. Author says that he had seen many rich bosses and the shady things around them.

Author's Note: 'Not all rich people are saints'>
